channel.title: Phoenix-Pkz
channel.description:
Hey this server was advertised along time ago, it got closed down but now its back! It is a PI server.
First people who haven't played PI before here is the stuff.
Teleports:
Varrock Teleport(Monsters Teleports), you can goto,
Rock Crabs Taverly Dungeon Slayer Tower Brimhaven Dungeon Hill Giants.
Lumbridge Teleport(Minigames Teleports) you can goto,
Barrows Pest Control TzHaar Cave Duel Arena Warrior Guild
Falador Teleport(Boss Teleports)
Godwars Nomad(Be Ready) Dagannoth Kings Tormented Deamons Corporal Beast
Camelot Teleport(PvP Teleports) Mage Bank Green Dragons(13 Wild) Multi Pk Zones( Click Multi Pk Zones then you can click, Chaos Alter or Carnage ) Edgeville
Ardougne Teleport(Skilling Zone)
Watch Tower Teleport(Cities) Lumbridge Varrock Camelot Falador Ardougne(Thieving here)
Trollheim(Agility and Hunter)
I want to train Hunter! I want to train Agility!
[size=18pt]Skill Zone![/size]
[img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/5215/skillzone1.png[/img] [img]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/503/skillzone2.png[/img] [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/8269/skillzonefarming.png[/img] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/2584/bobshopskillzone.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Agility & Hunter & Thieving![/size]
[img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5263/agilityy.png[/img] [img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/6540/hunteruj.png[/img] [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/4393/thievingu.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Shops![/size]
[img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/8426/archerstore.png[/img] [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/2461/armourstore.png[/img] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/3375/magicstore.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/4995/purepkingstore.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/2499/weaponsstore.png[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/4940/suppliesstore.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/2083/extrashop.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7199/barrowsshop.png[/img] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/8185/pkpointsshop.png[/img] [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/2913/pkpointsshop2.png[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/9475/shopslocation.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Bosses![/size]
[img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/7427/tormenteddemons.png[/img] [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/2199/nomadsy.png[/img] [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/2749/corpa.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Train![/size]
[img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/1461/rockcrabsr.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Slayer Task & Slayer Tower![/size]
[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/8447/slayerh.png[/img] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/1341/slayertower.png[/img]
Now I'm going to tell you about the Vote for Points System, you can vote by typing ::vote ingame, and once you have voted you can type ::reward for money and 5 vote points! Here is the Vote Shop!
[img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/8797/voteshop.png[/img]
Prices:
Profound Decorative Helm: 15 Vote Points. Profound Decorative Platebody: 35 Vote Points. Profound Decorative Platelegs: 35 Vote Points. Profound Decorative Shield: 15 Vote Points. Profound Decorative Sword: 15 Vote Points.
Present: 4 Vote Points. Amulet of Fury(or): 30 Vote Points. Enhanced Excalibur: 10 Vote Points.
Elite Black Full Helm: 5 Vote Points. Elite Black Platebody: 10 Vote Points. Elite Black Platelegs: 10 Vote Points.
Rune Cane: 5 Vote Points. Voting Hat(Blue): 3 Vote Points. Voting Hat(Red): 3 Vote Points. Diamond Ring(I): 15 Vote Points. Onyx Ring(I): 30 Vote Points. Crystal Key(For The Chest): 3 Vote Points. Inferno Adze: 25 Vote Points. Dragon Axe: 12 Vote Points. Dragon Pickaxe: 12 Vote Points. Yellow Abyssal Whip: 5 Vote Points. Blue Abyssal Whip: 5 Vote Points. Silver Abyssal Whip: 5 Vote Points.
Forums - [url=http://phoenixpkz.net78.net]http://phoenixpkz.net78.net[/url] WebClient - [url=http://phoenixpk.sytes.net/webclient/]http://phoenixpk.sytes.net/webclient/[/url] Vote - http://phoenixpkz.net78.net/misc.php?page=Vote4Us Type ::reward ingame after.

item.description:
@Frostyfuzz wrote:

Hey this server was advertised along time ago, it got closed down but now its back! It is a PI server.

First people who haven’t played PI before here is the stuff.

Teleports:

Varrock Teleport(Monsters Teleports), you can goto,

Taverly Dungeon

Now I’m going to tell you about the Vote for Points System, you can vote by typing ::vote ingame, and once you have voted you can type ::reward for money and 5 vote points! Here is the Vote Shop!

Profound Decorative Platebody: 35 Vote Points.
